params.812: Reach level 5 in the Strength skill.
params.813: Ensure your combat style is set to provide Strength XP. The Chickens near Lumbridge are suitable targets to fight.
params.814: Train your Strength to level 5 by fighting nearby monsters!|Equip your armour and weapon.|Ensure your combat style is set to provide Strength XP.|Take some food to keep your hitpoints high.|The Chickens near Lumbridge are suitable targets to fight.|Chickens drop Raw chicken that can be cooked and used as food. They also drop feathers which can be used for Fly-fishing or used in fletching if you are a member.|You can bury bones to gain Prayer experience.
params.823: Set your combat style to the correct stance to gain Strength experience.
params.936: A hint arrow has been added above a Chicken you could attack.
params.938: Look for a Chicken near the hint arrow location.
